snippet: The Republican-dominated State House passed a bill on Wednesday that would exempt employers with religious objections from having to cover contraception for employees.
abstract: New Hampshire's Republican-dominated State House passes a bill that would exempt employers with religious objections from having to cover contraception for employees; bill was proposed in opposition to the federal mandate for contraception coverage.
lead_paragraph: The Republican-dominated State House passed a bill on Wednesday that would exempt employers with religious objections from having to cover contraception for employees.

headline.main: New Hampshire: Bill Would End Requirement on Contraceptives Coverage Among Some Employers
headline.print_headline: New Hampshire: Bill Would End Requirement On Contraceptives Coverage Among Some Employers
